violations: Worker not wearing a hard hat
Worker not using fall protection harness near edge
Improper stacking of materials creating trip hazard
locations: Top left corner at the edge
Center of image with wooden materials
Center leading to top right corner
recommendations: Ensure all workers wear hard hats at all times
All workers should wear high-visibility vests
Use fall protection harnesses when working near edges
Organize and secure materials to prevent tripping
Clear pathways of debris to maintain clear access
worker_positions: Two in the center near the piled debris
One near the top left corner on the edge
One at the right side near the stacks of materials

worker_identifiers.features: Blue shirt, no helmet, center of image
Yellow shirt, no vest, center of image
Near the top left corner at the edge, no harness
